title: Three Little Birds
lyrics:
Singin', "Don't worry about a thing
'Cause every little thing is gonna be alright
Baby, don't worry about a thing
'Cause every little thing is gonna be alright"

Woke up this mornin' and smiled with the risin' sun
Three little birds by my doorstep
Singin' sweet songs, melodies pure and true
Sayin', "This is my message to you, ooh-ooh, yeah"

Baby, don't worry about a thing
'Cause every little thing is gonna be alright
Baby, don't worry about a thing
'Cause every littlе thing is gonna be alright

Oh-oh, oh-oh-oh
Mm-mm, mm-hmm

Singin', "Don't worry about a thing
'Cause evеry little thing is gonna be alright
Baby, don't worry about a thing
'Cause every little thing is gonna be alright"

It's gonna be alright
Mm-mm, mm-hmm, mm-hmm
It's gonna be alright, yeah
Ooh (Ooh), ooh-ooh-ooh
It's gonna be alright
